pathAssistantSteps.info:
During this phase you will continue to check the quality of your merchant's after-sales service and KPIs. Be sure to check the "SAV Not Ok" box if you have any concerns with your merchant during the NMO.


NMO 2 will last 30 days.


-> When your merchant's NMO 2 is going to be extended you have 2 options:

  1. Decide to keep this merchant in NMO 2 (= must be EXCEPTIONAL)
  2. Trigger an exit process in draft

During this phase you will continue to check the quality of your merchant's after-sales service and KPIs. Be sure to check the "SAV Not Ok" box if you have any concerns with your merchant during the NMO.


After 2 weeks, your merchant will automatically move to Phase 2.

During this phase you will continue to check the quality of your merchant's after-sales service and KPIs. Be sure to check the "SAV Not Ok" box if you have any concerns with your merchant during the NMO.


Phase 2 will end 21 days after your merchant has reached 100 sales. Or after 60 days if he has not reached the 100 sales aware of his NMO.


During phase 2 of the NMO your merchant can reach the 100 sales threshold. In this case NewBiz will be able to ask you if the merchant's limitation can be reduced from 5 to 10, so it will use the chatter to get your agreement.
